pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Estimation and Inference in Covariate-Adaptive Randomization // Performs robust estimation and inference when using covariate adjustment and/or covariate-adaptive randomization in randomized controlled trials. Ting Ye, Jun Shao, Yanyao Yi, Qinyuan Zhao (2023) doi:10.1080/01621459.2022.2049278. Ting Ye, Marlena Bannick, Yanyao Yi, Jun Shao (2023) doi:10.1080/24754269.2023.2205802. Ting Ye, Jun Shao, Yanyao Yi (2023) doi:10.1093/biomet/asad045. Marlena Bannick, Jun Shao, Jingyi Liu, Yu Du, Yanyao Yi, Ting Ye (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2306.10213.
